plum.type module¶

class plum.type.VarArgs(type=<class 'object'>)[source]¶

Bases: plum.type.AbstractType

Plum type that represents a variable number of the same Plum type.

Parameters:type (type or ptype, optional) – Type or Plum type of the variable number of types. Defaults to object.
expand(num)[source]¶

Expand the varargs to a tuple of types.

Parameters:num (int) – Length of the tuple.
Returns:Expansion.
Return type:tuple

class plum.type.Self[source]¶

Bases: plum.resolvable.Reference, plum.type.PromisedType

Reference Plum type.

Note

Both resolvable.Reference and type.PromisedType implement resolve(). We need that from resolvable.Reference, so we inherit from resolvable.Reference first.

Returns:t is object.
